creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: funnel shaped cap with long top piece with three dangling flaps; body is tan burlap-like fabric; flaps are blue-green; covered overall with cowry shells; shells edge bottom and flaps; black and white beads on flaps and in rings on top vertical piece
dimension: 11 5/8 x 6 3/8 x 6 3/8 in. (29.53 x 16.19 x 16.19 cm) (including dangling shells)
medium: Plant fibers, cotton (?), cowry shells, beads
title: Hat
